SELECT COUNT( X.seq ) FROM ( SELECT A.seq AS seq , A.usr_id AS usrId , B.usr_nm AS usrNm , A.log_act AS logAct , A.log_path AS logPath , A.log_ip AS logIp , A.log_hr AS logHr , A.msg_res AS msgRes FROM g_log_info A LEFT JOIN g_usr_info B ON A.usr_id = B.usr_id ) X WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( TO_CHAR( X.logHr, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{ sDate } AND #{ eDate } )
AND ( ( X.usrId LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.usrNm LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logAct LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logPath LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logIp LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) )
AND ( ( X.logAct LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ logAct }, '%' ) ) )

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.seq) AS rowNo , T.* FROM ( SELECT X.seq , X.usrType , X.usrId , X.usrNm , X.logType , X.logAct , X.logPath , X.logIp , X.logHr , X.msgRes FROM ( SELECT A.seq AS seq , A.usr_type AS usrType , A.usr_id AS usrId , B.usr_nm AS usrNm , A.log_type AS logType , A.log_act AS logAct , A.log_path AS logPath , A.log_ip AS logIp , A.msg_res AS msgRes , TO_CHAR( log_hr, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS logHr FROM g_log_info A LEFT JOIN g_usr_info B ON A.usr_id = B.usr_id ) X WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( TO_CHAR( X.logHr, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{ sDate } AND #{ eDate } )
AND ( ( X.usrId LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.usrNm LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logAct LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logPath LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) OR ( X.logIp LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' ) ) )
AND ( ( X.logAct LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ logAct }, '%' ) ) )
ORDER BY X.seq DESC ) T ORDER BY rowNo DESC LIMIT #{sizePerPage} OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 1
